You can download all datasets used in this study here:

- [Xenium Breast Cancer Dataset 1](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1V4yT-O1kSBGcrZzVSCZdA5Vzdbo9Tuav?usp=sharing)
- Xenium Breast Cancer Dataset 2
- [VisiumHD Breast Cancer Dataset](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1OLjApzRVFTzSk9fM6tzkaWp4tRCP4umV?usp=sharing)
- [VisiumHD Colorectal Cancer Dataset](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1YetWe_b_TNmD4vPr1vignSNH2Ewe728s?usp=sharing)


Note: Xenium breast cancer dataset 2 is unpublished yet. The processed data and analysis outputs will be deposited to the NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) once the GEO submission system becomes available after the ongoing U.S. government shutdown. Public access will be provided immediately upon successful deposition.
